attributes.action: Call a vote of no confidence in the Prime minister and the current government.
attributes.additional_details: As such, we the people command you to step down that a more worthy government take your place.
attributes.background: We the people of this great nation demand that you the elected officials that represent us hold a vote of no confidence in the Prime minister and this current government. You have shown that you are unworthy to run this country in the best interests of it's people.
